title: When an Assassin Tries to Solo a Tank

replies.body:
{{champion:114}} vs {{champion:14}} 

Oh, wait. That's not right...
No, it is. Just play him right.
hahaha...i get it tanky ekko is scary ekko.

> [{quoted}](name=GetMariahCarried,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mKMx9gx8,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-28T22:37:04.746+0000)
>
> anyone vs. {{champion:99}}

Tank Lux too stronk.
Every time I go up against the kench

This is actually false. Master Yi can 1v1 ANY tank.
In Kench's case, you can just burn up his HP and QSS out of his mouth.

You don't even need to QSS out (it deals the damage anyways) but it does make things go faster so Tahm's friends hopefully don't have the time to show up
As long as Yi isn't behind and Tahm isn't fed... Yi should be fine as long as Yi have some life steal (as Tahm usually don't have enough burst/damage to 100-0 anyone) as Tahm usually stacks a crap ton of HP so he is basically a huge hp sponge to life steal off
Yasuo is actually a fighter, not an assassin, and destroys tanks in fights.

>Yasuo is actually a ~~fighter~~ piece of bullcrap champ

Fixed

Not debatable. I don't know why I have all these downvotes, either. Just because a champ can assassinate people does NOT mean that they are an assassin. Yasuo is an obvious sustained fighter due to his low cooldowns and auto-attack based kit.

That's like saying Diana isn't a assassin because she isn't classified as one. She can literally blow you up in a second. A fighter is essentially equal to a bruiser, but you don't build Yas like a bruiser, you build him like a assassin, hence him being a assassin.

Also Yas's secondary role is Assassin. Ahri's is as well and people call her a assassin when her assassinations are no where near as strong as they once where.

Also my debatable was more towards the him destroying tanks, When I have to jungle I enjoy taking Rammus into him, build thornmail and a Titanic Hydra (Laugh all you want) and I've yet to lose a 1v1 to a Yas with that combo. I'm sure it could and can happen but I personally have not.
xin zhao is a fighter not an assassin
ON the PBE xin is an ad/ap scaling drain fighter/tank/assassin with low cooldown mobility and %hp damage
Not really an assassin, given the he probably has the highest DPS potential in the game.
Does she? Never seen her do Yi levels of damage, but that might be because I almost never see her.

her DPS is piss to Yi. i play Cass, and the only way she can out DPS a yi is if she is fed, or catchs Yi in her ult to stun him.

Edit: Early game, if she has enough mana, her DPS is better then Yi's though since she can cast her damaging spell every 0.5 seconds, giving her effectly an attack speed of 2.0

Yes Cassiopeia will probably have the highest DPS in the entire game... but that is with a build like {{item:3089}} {{item:3040}} {{item:3040}} {{item:3040}} {{item:3040}} {{item:3040}} (each Seraph's Embrace will give 272 AP before counting Cassiopeia's passive and Rabadons passive) which will give her almost 3000 DPS with her E alone

With more realistic builds Yi might deal more damage
...what? How does that not make him an assassin?
